name: Thunderbore Trap
description:
After a character on this side of the field uses a Skill: Deals 2 Electro DMG to their team's active character.
Usage(s): Initial amount equal to the number of Bonecruncher's Energy Block discarded when created. (Max 3 stacks)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character on this side of the field uses a Skill:</color> Deals 2 $[K104] to their team's active character.\n$[K3]: Initial amount equal to the number of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124051]</color> discarded when created. (Max 3 stacks)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character on this side of the field uses a Skill:</color> Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to their team's active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: Initial amount equal to the number of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> discarded when created. (Max 3 stacks)
